qas.question: In what year was a telephone exchange established in Melbourne?
When was the first electric light installed in the Eastern Market?
In what year was the first line of the Melbourne cable tramway system built?
In what building was the Melbourne Internation Exhibition of 1880 held?

context: The decade began with the Melbourne International Exhibition in 1880, held in the large purpose-built <a3_0>Exhibition Building<a3_0/>. In <a0_0>1880<a0_0/> a telephone exchange was established and in the same year the foundations of St Paul's, were laid; in <a1_0>1881<a1_0/> electric light was installed in the Eastern Market, and in the following year a generating station capable of supplying 2,000 incandescent lamps was in operation. In <a2_0>1885<a2_0/> the first line of the Melbourne cable tramway system was built, becoming one of the worlds most extensive systems by 1890.
